bibl.title: Antonia Augusta. Portrait of a great Roman lady. Foreword by Fergus MILLAR. With illustrations by Franco VARTUCA.
bibl.note: Voir pp. 68-86, figg. 50-59 et tabl. c-d: The papyri of Antonia.
KOKKINOS Nikos, Antonia Augusta. Portrait of a great Roman lady. Foreword by Fergus MILLAR. With illustrations by Franco VARTUCA.
London - New York, Routledge, 1992, 8°, xviii-254 pp., 1 front., 13 tabl., 111 figg. ISBN 0-415-08029-0. £35.
